EmailTemplate.name: More information requested ( English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Privacy request - Additional info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer, Thank you very much for contacting DuPont.
We have received the contact details you have included in DuPont Privacy form, but there's no request provided.
In order to provide you with a satisfactory answer we need a detailed description on your enquiry.
We look forward to your reply.
Sincerely ,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
